title: Germany Steps Up Measures to Conserve Gas as Russia Slows Supply to Europe
sub_head: Berlin to restart coal-fired plants and auction gas to reduce consumption
body:
BERLINâ€”Germany will restart coal-fired power plants and offer incentives for companies to curb natural gas consumption, marking a new step in the economic war between Europe and Russia.
Berlin unveiled the measures on Sunday after Russia cut gas supplies to Europe last week as it punched back against European sanctions and military support for Ukraine.
